title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse

Overview:
Experience smooth, precise cursor control without moving your arm. The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is a classic ambidextrous trackball mouse designed for all-day comfort and dependable performance at home or the office.

Key Features:
- Trackball precision: 300 DPI optical tracking for accurate, fluid cursor control.
- Ambidextrous design: Comfortable for both left-handed and right-handed users.
- Side-to-side scrolling: Effortlessly navigate horizontally across wide documents and spreadsheets.
- Simple, reliable controls: Two responsive buttons for primary actions.
- Flexible connectivity: Works via USB or legacy PS/2 for broad compatibility.
- Durable build: Engineered for long-lasting performance.

Design and Colors:
- Color accents: Red trackball with gray and white body elements.
- Dimensions: 7 x 4 x 2.5 inches (L x W x H) for a supportive, palm-filling feel.

Compatibility:
- Plug-and-play with USB; PS/2 support for older systems. Ideal for desktops where space is limited or for users seeking ergonomic alternatives to traditional mice.

What’s in the Box:
- Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse
- USB connection (PS/2 support where applicable)
- Quick start information

Specifications:
- Type: Trackball Mouse
- DPI: 300
- Buttons: 2
- Connectivity: USB, PS/2
- Suitable for: Left-handed and right-handed users
- Country of Origin: China

Why You’ll Love It:
Reduce wrist movement, gain precision, and enjoy a timeless design that just works. Whether you’re navigating large spreadsheets, editing documents, or browsing, the Trackman Marble 2017 keeps you comfortable and in control.
